query: User can't sync email in Outlook

iterations.thought: The user is experiencing email sync issues.  The knowledge base doesn't directly address Outlook sync problems, but it does contain general IT policies and network information.  The most likely causes are related to the user's email configuration, network connectivity, or account permissions.  Since we don't have any previous investigation history, we need to start with verifying the email configuration and network connectivity.
iterations.reflection: The email configuration for the user 'default_user' at 'company.com' has been successfully verified. All specified settings (server, port, SSL, authentication) are correctly configured and working. There are no reported issues and the last synchronization was on 2025-10-16.
